editnotify-page-edit-label: Label for the link to the edited page in alert messages in [[Special:Notifications]].
editnotify-title-message: Label for message title for edit page notification.
editnotify-title-message-create: Label for message title for page create notification.
editnotify-flyout-message: Label for flyout message for edit page notification.
editnotify-flyout-message-create: Label for flyout message for create page notification.
editnotify-primary-message: Used as primary message in email notification.
editnotify-email-subject-message:
Used as label for subject in email notification for edit page event. Parameters:
* $2 - name of the modified page
editnotify-email-subject-message-create:
Used as label for subject in email notification for page create event. Parameters:
* $2 - name of newly created page
editnotify-email-subject-message-templat:
Used as label for subject in email notification for change in template field. Parameters:
* $2 - name of modified page
* $3 - modified field 
* $4 - new field value
editnotify-email-body-message:
Description of the edit page event in email notification. Parameters:
* $1 - name of modified page
* $2 - page type of event
editnotify-email-body-message-create:
Description of the page create event in email notification. Parameters:
* $1 - name of modified page
editnotify-email-body-message-template:
Description of the change in template field in email notification. Parameters:
* $1 - modified field
* $2 - existing field value
* $3 - new field value
* $4 - name of modified page
* $5 - name of modified page
* $6 - page type of event
notification-header-edit-notify-create:
Label for alert notification message for page creation. Parameters:
* $2 - name of the newly created page
notification-header-edit-notify-edit-maj:
Used as alert notification message for edit page event in all pages. Parameters:
* $3 - name of the modified page
notification-header-edit-notify-edit-min:
Used as alert notification message for edit page event in all pages. Parameters:
* $3 - name of the modified page
